repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu 

ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED 1 
ADD requirements.txt /root/requirements.txt 

RUN apt-get update && \
 apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install python3 python3-pip wget && \
 pip3 install --no-cache-dir -r /root/requirements.txt && rm -f /root/requirements.txt && \
wget -O- https://get.docker.com | bash && \
apt-get -y purge python3-pip wget && \
apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ADD LICENSE /root/codersos_image_server/LICENSE 
ADD codersos_image_server /root/codersos_image_server 

WORKDIR /root 
CMD ["python3", "-m", "codersos_image_server.app"]
